verbose_text: PABP1 was tagged with a C-terminal PTP epitope (puromycin resistance) in PABP1 RNAi cell line, with an N-terminal PTP epitope (blasticidin resistance) in PABP1-3'UTR RNAi cell line, and with a C-terminal triple HA epitope (puromycin resistance) in 427 cell line, CRK1 RNAi cell line, and cell lines overexpressing wild-type and mutant eIF4E4.
evidence: HA epitope (puromycin resistance) in 427 cell line, CRK1 RNAi cell line, and cell lines overexpressing wild-type and mutant eIF4E4
